name: Sweet Shop Panic
description:
How many orders can you take in 20 seconds?

Sweet Shop Panic is a fast-paced arcade-style game where you make the correct order to satisfy ever-increasing customers. You have 20 seconds to get as much money as possible.

If you enjoy the game, please follow me as I will (occasionally) make more games in the future. If you want to give suggestions or see it get developed in the future, please leave a comment.

Thank you!
